name: Ravels - Humor
description:
Ravels - Humor entertains players with 125 fun filled quotations in 3 challenge levels. You'll recognize classics from Groucho Marx and W.C. Fields, revisit your childhood with Bill Cosby, and get a giggle with Ellen DeGeneres, Lewis Black, or Billy Crystal.

The creative minds at GabySoft have a new challenge for you! Ravels tangles up the wise and crazy utterances of the world's most visible people. Your goal is to root out the component words of those quotations and then arrange them back in the correct order.

Sound easy? You might be surprised by three challenge levels and options, plus a timer, to push you over the edge! GabySoft created Ravels for those who were bored by Word Search and Jumble puzzles and wanted an addicting higher level game that was thought provoking and different. So sit back, grab your favorite beverage, and lets begin!
